data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Roma with the kick-off.
Free kick for Roma in the half of Torino.
In the minute 2, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 5, Roma pushes forward through Edin Dzeko, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Torino's Andrea Belotti gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Roma defender.
In the minute 7, Torino have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Free kick Roma.
Wilfried Stephane Singo (Torino) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Roma's Bruno Peres breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 11, Rosario Abisso awards Torino a goal kick.
Torino's Andrea Belotti goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 14, Roma needs to be cautious. Torino have an attacking throw-in.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Wilfried Stephane Singo (Torino) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 15, The match at Stadio Olimpico has been interrupted briefly for a check on Leonardo Spinazzola, who is down injured.
Can Roma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Roma drive upfield and Lorenzo Pellegrini gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Torino defender.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Roma.
Gianluca Mancini gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
Corner awarded to Roma.
In the minute 18, Leonardo Spinazzola is back on the pitch.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Torino's area.
Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 19, Throw-in high up the field for Roma in Rome.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Torino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, Bruno Peres (Roma) has received a yellow card from Rosario Abisso.
Torino's Andrea Belotti is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 23, Gianluca Mancini (Roma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Cristian Ansaldi is replacing Amer Gojak for Torino at Stadio Olimpico.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Play has been interrupted briefly in Rome to check on Sasa Lukic, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 26, Sasa Lukic is back on his feet again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gianluca Mancini of Roma smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 27, Henrikh Mkhitaryan scores to make it 1-0 at Stadio Olimpico.
Attention is being given to Torinoâ€™s Andrea Belotti and play has been suspended briefly.
Torino's Andrea Belotti is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 31, Roma to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 37, Roma's Leonardo Spinazzola gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico.
Throw-in Torino.
In the minute 41, Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 43, Roma are going well in Rome. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Jordan Veretout penalty.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Roma.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
The first-half is over at Stadio Olimpico.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cristian Ansaldi.
In the minute 45, The away team has substituted Cristian Ansaldi with Simone Edera. Marco Giampaolo is thus making his second change.
Torino kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Roma make their first substitution with Marash Kumbulla replacing Gianluca Mancini.
Rick Karsdorp is replacing Bruno Peres for the home team.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Tomas Rincon replacing Soualiho Meite.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Sasa Lukic with Jacopo Segre. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a Roma throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 48, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rome, Gonzalo Villar of Roma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Roma to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In the minute 50, Rosario Abisso signals a Roma throw-in in Torino's half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Roma in their own half.
Bremer for Torino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Roma have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Gonzalo Villar is booked for the home team.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Jacopo Segre of Torino is pulled up for offside.
Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a third substitution, with Pedro replacing Gonzalo Villar.
In the minute 60, Borja Mayoral is on a sub for Edin Dzeko for Roma.
Roma push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Jordan Veretout gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Torino defence.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 62, Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Roma have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Roma push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Marash Kumbulla gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Torino defence.
In the minute 64, Rosario Abisso awards the home team a throw-in.
Simone Edera hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Torino in Rome.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Lorenzo Pellegrini puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Borja Mayoral.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Leonardo Spinazzola with Riccardo Calafiori.
In Rome Torino drive forward through Lyanco. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Andrea Belotti keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 74, In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Important block from the Roma defence as Jacopo Segre fires in a strike for Torino.
Free kick for Torino in the half of Roma.
Andrea Belotti (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
In the minute 77, Federico Bonazzoli is on a sub for Alessandro Buongiorno for Torino.
In the minute 78, In Rome Torino attack through Federico Bonazzoli. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 78, Lyanco (Torino) gets a yellow card.
Torino are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Can Torino capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Torino are coming forward and Simone Edera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rosario Abisso awards Roma a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Torino.
In the minute 84, Bremer's header is off-target for Torino.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Olimpico.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 86, Can Torino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma.
Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 89, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Torino's Federico Bonazzoli gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Roma defender.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Roma's Borja Mayoral misses with an attempt on goal.
Important block from the Torino defence as Borja Mayoral fires in a strike for Roma.
Corner awarded to Roma.
The match has come to a close in Rome. The final score is 3-1.
Riccardo Calafiori (Roma) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
